node.Title: My Weekend Pizza
node.content: This is a pizza order web application created for MyWeekendPizza Company based in Wrexham Town Centre. To make this project done I've used the following technologies:  React.js, Next.js, typescript, node.js express framework, styled-components, gsap animations, WebSocket,

node.Title: my weekend pizza - windows 10 admin panel
node.content: This project is also created for my weekend pizza. Application is electron framework based windows 10 native app. To create the project I've used also react / redux stack and styled-components for styles. I've achieved native windows UI by react desktop UI kit.
